directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain, and return to pot.
Combine pasta with powdered cheese mixture and condensed soup. Mix until evenly coated.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
title: Nic's Easiest, Creamiest Macaroni and Cheese
